pageHeader.subtitle: Worked as a staff designer at the first Razorfish office in San Francisco.
pageHeader.description: >- Rocket Lawyer is an online legal services company that allows users to create legally binding documents or other legal entities. I worked closely with the marketing team to produce Optimizely A/B tests for improving customer turnover and customer engagement.

projectInfo.results: Presented at the Design designer(s) exhibition, part of the 'Lille World Design Capital 2020'.
